hero.name: Features
hero.description: We make sure all of our features are designed to be loved by every aspiring and even professional photograpers who wanted to share their stories.

features.name: 100% Responsive
features.description: No matter which the device you're on, our site is fully responsive and stories look beautiful on any screen.

features.name: No Photo Upload Limit
features.description: Our tool has no limits on uploads or bandwidth. Freely upload in bulk and share all of you stories in one go.

features.name: Available to Embed
features.description: Embed Tweets, Facebook posts, Instagram media, Vimeo or Youtube videos, Google Maps, and more.

features.name: Custom Domain
features.description: With Photosnap subscriptions you can host your stories on your own domain. You can also remove our branding!

features.name: Boost Your Exposure
features.description: Users that viewed your story or gallery can easily get notifed of new and featured stories with our built in mailing list.

features.name: Drag & Drop Image
features.description: Easily drag and drop your image and get beautiful shots everytime. No over the top tooling to add friction to creating stories.
